nodes.text: Sarvchi was a planet within the territory of the Chiss Ascendancy, located in a star system of the Ascendancy's east and southeast sectors. A number of Chiss migrated to Sarvchi after the climate of the species' homeworld, Csilla, grew less habitable.

Sarvchi was a location of significance to the Chiss Pommrio family. When Pommrio military personal received an emergency summons relating to a supposed unclaimed nyix mine on the world of Hoxim, they were asked to rendezvous at Sarvchi.
